column6:
Get Away from it all in a Country Cabin on a quiet cove of Lake Richland-Chambers, the third-largest lake in Texas, with GREAT Fishing and Big Open Water for Sports!

Situated on a wooded acre of lakefront near the deepest part of the lake, this simple two-bedroom cabin is comfortable and spacious with four rustic log beds. The 'great room' includes a full kitchen, dining room, and living room. 

\
